decks.notes: The focus of this Gruul Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, aggressive creatures and powerful combat tricks. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence early on with efficient creatures like Pelt Collector and Bonecrusher Giant, while maintaining pressure with haste creatures like Robber of the Rich and Gruul Spellbreaker. The deck also includes cards like Embercleave and Collision / Colossus to push through damage and close out the game quickly. Overall, the strategy revolves around playing aggressive threats and having the capability to end the game in a few turns.

The deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast multiple spells for free each turn, allowing for powerful control of the board. The deck includes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils, along with threats like Shark Typhoon and Agent of Treachery. The deck also includes cards like Elspeth Conquers Death and Shatter the Sky to control the board and disrupt opponent's strategies. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as a companion to provide additional value and versatility. The key concept of the deck is to maintain control of the game through powerful spells and strategic plays.

This deck focuses on controlling the board and out-valuing the opponent by utilizing powerful control spells such as Dovin's Veto and Mystical Dispute. The deck aims to control the game's tempo with board wipes like Shatter the Sky and resilient threats like Shark Typhoon. By generating card advantage with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils, the deck can grind out victories in the late game. Lukka, Coppercoat Outcast and Agent of Treachery provide powerful threats that can close out the game or swing the board in your favor.

This deck focuses on maintaining a fast tempo and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and sacrificing synergies. Utilizing cards like Cauldron Familiar, Witch's Oven, and Mayhem Devil, the deck aims to deal consistent damage while generating value from sacrificing and recurring creatures. The addition of Obosh as a companion enhances the deck's ability to deal even more damage with odd-costed creatures. By combining sacrifice effects, recursion, and aggressive creatures, this deck aims to pressure the opponent and secure victory through a combination of direct damage and board presence.

The deck focuses on quickly cycling through cards to build up a large graveyard and then utilizing cards like Zenith Flare and Drannith Stinger to deal damage based on the number of cards in the graveyard. The deck includes various cycling cards to keep drawing into more cards and triggering effects such as Valiant Rescuer to create tokens. Lurrus of the Dream-Den serves as a companion to provide additional recursion for the deck. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and direct damage spells.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while also generating value from cards like Teferi, Narset, and Lukka. The goal is to stall the game with board wipes like Shatter the Sky and generate card advantage to eventually overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats like Shark Typhoon and Agent of Treachery. The deck also includes Yorion as a companion to provide additional value through flickering permanents for more card advantage and flexibility in gameplay.

This deck focuses on quick and aggressive plays, utilizing creatures like Gruul Spellbreaker, Pelt Collector, and Questing Beast to apply pressure early on. The combination of Embercleave and Collision / Colossus allows for powerful combat tricks and potential for massive damage. The inclusion of cards like Robber of the Rich and Bonecrusher Giant helps maintain board presence and disruption. Anax, Hardened in the Forge and Shifting Ceratops offer resilience and flexibility in different matchups. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of speed, power, and versatility.

The focus of this deck is to control the game by countering opponents' spells, ramping up mana quickly, and generating value with cards like Wilderness Reclamation and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath. The deck aims to slow down the game until it can overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells like Expansion / Explosion and Shark Typhoon. The key strategy is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building up resources to secure a victory through card advantage and mana advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to play aggressively by cycling cards to trigger effects that benefit from cycling. The deck focuses on using cards like Frostveil Ambush, Memory Leak, and Zenith Flare to maintain pressure on the opponent while building a board presence with creatures like Drannith Healer and Valiant Rescuer. By utilizing the cycling mechanic and the companion Lurrus of the Dream-Den, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently. Additionally, the deck includes mana-fixing lands like Savai Triome to ensure consistency in casting spells.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize a combination of cycling cards and aggressive creatures to efficiently build a strong board presence and deal damage to the opponent quickly. By cycling through cards and utilizing cards like Zenith Flare and Drannith Stinger, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of threats and burn damage. The companion card, Lurrus of the Dream-Den, allows for additional value by allowing the player to recur low-cost cycling creatures from the graveyard.

The deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while controlling the board with removal and disruption. The goal is to generate card advantage and stabilize the board with cards like Narset, Teferi, and Shatter the Sky, eventually establishing dominance with high impact cards like Agent of Treachery and Elspeth Conquers Death. Yorion, Sky Nomad provides additional value by flickering permanents for extra card advantage and board presence. The deck aims to control the game until its powerful late-game threats can take over and secure victory.

The deck aims to control the board by using Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while generating value with cards like Teferi, Narset, and Lukka. Yorion, Sky Nomad acts as a companion to provide additional value through blinking permanents. The deck also utilizes cards like Shark Typhoon and Elspeth Conquers Death for further control and removal options. Overall, the key strategy is to outvalue and outcontrol opponents through efficient spellcasting and card advantage.

The deck revolves around utilizing Fires of Invention to play powerful spells for free, while maintaining control over the board with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Shatter the Sky. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value by flickering permanents for extra triggers. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with counterspells and removal spells, then close out the game with big threats like Agent of Treachery and Shark Typhoon. The key strategy is to establish and maintain control of the game until victory is achieved.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free. Using cards like Narset, Teferi, and Lukka, it aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while generating card advantage. The deck also includes cards like Shark Typhoon and Agent of Treachery to create threats and steal key permanents from the opponent. The addition of Yorion as a companion allows for additional value by blinking permanents for extra triggers. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent through efficient control and resource management.

The key strategy of this deck is to utilize sacrifice effects and graveyard recursion to maintain board pressure and outvalue the opponent. By combining cards like Witch's Oven, Priest of Forgotten Gods, and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily chipping away at their life total. Lurrus of the Dream-Den provides additional value by allowing you to recur key threats from your graveyard. The deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and resource management to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and burn spells. With a low mana curve and high damage output, this deck aims to consistently apply pressure and secure a quick victory. Cards like Torbran, Thane of Red Fell and Anax, Hardened in the Forge boost the damage of red creatures, while cards like Fervent Champion and Bonecrusher Giant provide versatility and removal options. The inclusion of Embercleave and Castle Embereth further enhances the aggressive nature of the deck, allowing for explosive finishes.
